description: Breeze Man Long Johns are soft and lightweight long johns in the very finest Merino wool quality, specially developed for days with a need for ultra-light clothing that is breathable and regulates body temperature. Also perfect as the innermost layer next to the body in cold weather. The entire Breeze collection is made from 100% Merino wool of our finest quality, which is extremely soft and guaranteed to be scratch-free against the skin.
name: Devold Breeze Merino 150 Longs - Mens
